message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $145. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I want to make sure it's a good deal for me too.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $137.5? It's a small adjustment, but I'm confident you'll find it worthwhile.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $135? I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous offers.
